scripts.build:lambda:scraping: rm -rf dist/scraping_lambda && esbuild scraping_lambda/scraping_lambda.ts --bundle --minify --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/scraping_lambda/index.js && cd dist && zip -r -j -D scraping_lambda.zip scraping_lambda
scripts.build:lambda:notification: rm -rf dist/notification_lambda && esbuild notification_lambda/notification_lambda.ts --bundle --minify --platform=node --target=es2020 --outfile=dist/notification_lambda/index.js && cd dist && zip -r -j -D notification_lambda.zip notification_lambda
scripts.build:lambda:all: bun run build:lambda:scraping && bun run build:lambda:notification
scripts.publish:lambda:all: bun run publish:lambda:scraping && bun run publish:lambda:notification
